returnMessages.welcome:
Welcome to the Dungeon. You fell asleep and found yourself here.
The only way out is to explore the rooms towards the exit.
Each door you check out counts as a step.
returnMessages.doorNonExistant: Door %d does not exist. Please pick on that actually exists.
returnMessages.nextRoom: You entered the next room in the dungeon.
returnMessages.help:
These are the available commands in the game:
{n} - A number to select a door
steps - Check out how many steps you have spent on the current dungeon
quit - stop and exit the game
help - this message
returnMessages.blockedDoor: This door is blocked from the other side or is a mimick. Nonetheless, you cannot go past it.
returnMessages.difficultyChoice:
Pick a difficulty to play:
1 - 15 Rooms
2 - 20 Room
3 - 25 Rooms
returnMessages.introduction:
Welcome to Dungeon Escape. Your mission is to escape the dungeon you are currently in.
Type 'start' to continue and play.
returnMessages.gameover: It seems there is no way out of the dungeon, and you died from hunger. Better luck next time!
